newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-TV Filme still a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-TV Filme still a buy.

text.p: -- Robert Flemings & Co said it has reiterated its buy recommendation on Brazilian cable television firm TV Filme and maintained its price target of $17.50 per share for the end of 1997's third quarter.
-- In a report, Flemings analysts Walter Stoeppelwerth and Dan McGoey cited prospects for strong growth in subscribers despite a slow first quarter.
-- "The first quarter of the year is normally the slowest for new cable television subscriptions in Brazil because of the summer weather and the abundance of outdoor activities," they wrote.
-- They added that, in addition to increased marketing efforts, TV Filme has lowered installation fees to boost subscriber growth.
-- The firm currently is adding subscribers at a compound rate of 11-12 percent per quarter, or 55 percent a year.
-- "Present growth rates are high and are expected to be boosted in the near term through auction success and/or acquisition," the analysts said.
-- TV Filme's Level One American Depositary Receipt was untraded at 1242 local/1142 edt after closing at 11 on Wednesday.
